title: Dermot Whelan's Power Hour in Cork

children.text: Need something to look forward to once January's out of the way? We've got you. ðŸ‘€
On Wednesday, February 11, we're welcoming Dermot Whelanâ€”TV and radio broadcaster, comedian, and meditation teacherâ€”to the Cork office for a special wellness session.
Dermot swaps the jokes for simple, science-backed techniques to bust stress, build resilience, and feel more focusedâ€”don't worry, there'll definitely still be a few laughs along the way.
: There'll be lunch afterwards tooâ€”just let us know if you'll be in the office so we can order enough for everyone.
This session is open to everyone across Ireland and the UK, whether you're joining in person or online. Keep an eye out for a calendar invite coming shortly.
If you're Cork-based, we'd love to see you in the officeâ€”it's always nice to have a good crowd in, especially when we've got an external speaker joining us onsite.
